com.cisco.dvbu.ps.deploytool.gui.core.runtime.execute

Class ExecutePDTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cisco.dvbu.ps.deploytool.gui.core.runtime.execute.ExecutePDTool

  • public class ExecutePDTool
extends java.lang.Object

    This class is designed to run the ExecutePDTool script in a separate thread and capture the output for use by the client. Simply instance the class to kick off an execution. Check the launch result code to see if ExecutePDTool was able to start (may have to wait a few 1/10ths of a second for the value to change from NOT_READY to SUCCESS or FAILURE.) If the launch result code is SUCCESS then the log file path should be populated with the location of where the output from ExecutePDTool is being written (also used with the LogMessageBuffer class to reference specific execution's messages in memory.)

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Calvin Goodrich

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExecutePDTool

        public ExecutePDTool(java.lang.String iPlanPath,
             java.lang.String iConfPath)

        Constructor. For backwards compatibility of older usages.

        Parameters:
        iPlanPath - The absolute path to the deployment plan file. This can be set to null with TYPE_VCS_INIT executions.
        iConfPath - The absolute path to the deployment configuration file.

      • ExecutePDTool

        public ExecutePDTool(int iType,
             java.lang.String iPlanPath,
             java.lang.String iConfPath,
             java.lang.String iUsername,
             java.lang.String iPassword)

        Constructor. This also launches the ExecutePDTool script in a separate thread and captures the outputs to a log file.

        Parameters:
        iType - The type of execution to run. Valid values are TYPE_EXECUTE and TYPE_VCS_INIT.
        iPlanPath - The absolute path to the deployment plan file. This can be set to null with TYPE_VCS_INIT executions.
        iConfPath - The absolute path to the deployment configuration file.
        iUsername - The user name to use with TYPE_VCS_INIT executions. Can be set to null (user name will be picked up from the deployment configuration.
        iPassword - The password to use with TYPE_VCS_INIT executions. Can be set to null (password will be picked up from the deployment configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • getLaunchResult

        public int getLaunchResult()

        Returns the value of the launchResult field. Caller should wait until the value is no longer -1 before determining launch success or failure. NOTE: A success result merely indicates that the server was able to successfully launch the ExecutePDTool process, not necessarily that it completed successfully.

        Returns:
        The value.

      • getLogFilePath

        public java.lang.String getLogFilePath()

        Returns the value of the logPath field. Caller should wait until ExecutePDTool has successfully launched before using this value (it will be NULL until then.)

        Returns:
        The value.
